title: Edit the preset runes
body:
Will we be able to edit the preset runes or delete and keep in inventories? Soon?
This is officially a pay to win game {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: You start with 2(?) rune pages, but you can, in fact, hide the preset ones if you don't want to see them. The preset pages are just there so newer players don't have to stress about what to pick, and you can freely change the free ones you start with.
I can't edit them; they're locked. I am going to have to buy more rune pages since you can only have three pages not counting the five preset ones.
